item.title: How to deploy Hugo on GitHub?
item.description: Link git branch: gh-pages - Stack Overflow GitHub has just enabled using any branch and directory as the source for the docs. You no longer have to use gh-pages. Configuring a publishing source for your GitHub Pages site - GitHub Docs GitHub Pages | Websites for you and your projects, hosted directly from your GitHub repository. Just edit, push, and your changes are live.
